name: Wagu Technologies/ Happy Plus
description: Founded by a team of positive psychologists, happiness experts & researchers Happy+ believes in positive interventions which elevates happiness for all & makes them more productive, efficient and helps them live a thriving & fulfilling life. Happy+ is created by happiness experts, positive psychologists and researchers whose quest is to add happiness to the world through different interventions across stakeholders.
features: Employee listening strategy for improving the employee engagement.
Build a culture of engagement by constantly measuring engagement level of new hires.
Identify low engaged employee behaviors & dissatisfaction trigger points.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: We Exist To Increase Happiness At Workplace
ShortDescription: Happy+ is created by happiness experts, positive psychologists and researchers whose quest is to add happiness to the world through different interventions across stakeholders.
enhanced_description: Happy+ is a product from Wagu Technologies, developed by a team of positive psychologists, happiness experts, and researchers. Its core mission is to apply positive interventions to enhance workplace happiness, leading to increased productivity, efficiency, and a more thriving and fulfilling life for employees. The platform focuses on adding happiness through various interventions across all stakeholders.
key_use_cases: Implementing employee listening strategies to improve overall employee engagement.
Building and nurturing a culture of engagement by continuously measuring engagement levels, especially for new hires.
Identifying specific low engaged employee behaviors to understand root causes.
Pinpointing dissatisfaction trigger points within the workforce to enable targeted interventions.
competitive_advantages: Product development rooted in positive psychology and research, led by happiness experts and researchers, suggesting a scientifically-backed approach to employee well-being and engagement.
roi_benefits: Makes employees more productive and efficient.
Helps employees live a thriving and fulfilling life.
